nodes.text: Rakatan annihilators were large walkers used by the Infinite Empire of the Rakata species in their conquests. Shaped similar to the Star Forge like most Rakatan vehicles, Annihilators walked on two legs with a central sphere between them; the sphere featured two smaller lasers that complemented the large destructive beam that could be generated from its underside. A thin red viewport spanned the sphere. Annihilators were deployed on the planet Shikaakwa in 25,792 BBY during the invasion of the Tython system, though they were destroyed by Je'daii starfighters.
